name: ViDei
overview:
ViDeI - Innovations | Information | Infotainment. A People Company.ViDeI is one of the most innovative business startup. ViDeI is an IBM Business Partner, IBM Global Entrepreneur and Microsoft Bizspark Startup. Mission We at ViDeI:

1) Believe in shaping your Imaginations using the Rich potential that you possess. 2) Creating Products to make this Planet Smart! 3) Creating Solutions that Drive your Business. 4) Sharing Information, that you give you an Extra Edge 5)Training you to Excel! Company Overview A People Company.ViDeI is one of the most innovative business startup. ViDeI is an IBM Business Partner, IBM Global Entrepreneur and Microsoft Bizspark Startup. Description Inaugurated on 14th November 2009, ViDeI is one of the most innovative business startup. ViDeI is now IBM Business Partner and IBM Global Entrepreneur. We are now on Microsoft Partner Network too. With 25+ Clients, 10+ Domains, 5+ Short Movies, 10+ Innovative Products and a dedicated team, we are making the most of it!

The company has been specializing in creating most innovative products - that affect the masses, creating resources and training materials for the youths so that they have a winning edge and creating realistic cinemas. We are a pool of 25+ people of different genre solving customer problems and creating relations, that stay beyond business.
